name: BullsEye (itch) (Snailfish)
description:
You play an angry bull at the center of a bullseye field, surrounded by matadors and picadors. Your goal is to hit all the matadors (the men with red cloaks) to collect points,  before the time runs out. Beware of the picadors (the men with yellow spears), because they will stun you for couple of seconds. 

You control the bull with your mouse. Hold in the mouse button and aim in the opposite direction of where you want the bull to move. Then let go of the mouse button to attack.
